document_data.mainbody: '''Wild rice''' was a relative of the cultivated [[rice]] plant. It was found plentifully growing in shallows of freshwater lakes and slow rivers throughout the [[Sword Coast]], the [[Dalelands]], rural [[Sembia]], as well as [[Unther]] and [[Mulhorand]].{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20190913224021/https://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_070809-08.htm| title = So Saith Ed Jul - Sep 2008| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.Availability:
On the western continent of [[Maztica]], wild rice grew along with wild [[mayz]] in the green valley surrounding the city of [[Tukan]] in the [[Fertile Desert]] of the sweltering [[House of Tezca]].

[[Half-elves]] of [[Yuirwood]] and [[Aglarond]] cultivated wild rice and [[millet]] in the forest clearing. The rice was used as a trade commodity.

Wild rice grew along the rivers of Neth in the [[Border Kingdoms]] – namely the [[Sarradra]] river.
